mapper.select: SELECT C.COMMENT_ID, C.BOARD_ID, C.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, C.COMMENT_CONTENT, C.CREATE_DATE, C.PARENT_COMMENT_NO, C.COMMENT_DEL_FL FROM BOARD_COMMENT C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE C.BOARD_ID = #{boardId} ORDER BY C.PARENT_COMMENT_NO NULLS FIRST, C.CREATE_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_COMMENT (COMMENT_ID, BOARD_ID, MEMBER_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, PARENT_COMMENT_NO) VALUES (SEQ_COMMENT_ID.NEXTVAL, #{boardId}, #{memberNo}, #{commentContent}, #{parentCommentNo})
